seed_pair.known: 我记不住怎么说我想说的话。
seed_pair.target: I can't remember how to say what I wanted to say.

practice_phrases: Can't remember
记不住
I can't remember
我记不住
I can't remember how to say
我记不住怎么说
He can't remember a few words
他记不住几个词
I can't remember how to say a few words
我记不住怎么说几个词
She can't remember how to write a letter
她记不住怎么写封信
He can't remember how to do interesting things
他记不住怎么做有趣的事情
I can't remember how to do interesting things with my friends
我记不住怎么和朋友做有趣的事情
She can't remember how to write a letter to his friend
她记不住怎么给他的朋友写封信
When I didn't sleep well, I can't remember how to say a few words
当我没睡好的时候，我记不住怎么说几个词
What I wanted to say
我想说的话
I know what I wanted to say

这是我想说的话

我记不住我想说的话

他知道我想说的话

He can't remember what I wanted to say
他记不住我想说的话
I wanted to write what I wanted to say
我想写我想说的话
When I didn't sleep well, I can't remember what I wanted to say
当我没睡好的时候，我记不住我想说的话
My friend knows how to say what I wanted to say
我的朋友知道怎么说我想说的话
